description: Yuko is one of the members of the Ms. Mizuno Fan Club; aside from the fan club, she is very athletic and is part of her high school`s track and field club where she`s the star athlete. Even though she gets a lot of male admirers even at her school, she has no interests in men; claiming that they`re nothing more than perverted creeps. She appears to be romantically interested in her best friend Akemi, whom she is very close with; as the story progresses, she and Akemi become more affectionate to each other, even to the point were it eventually becomes sexual.
name: Koizumi Yuko
